short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab interface into a stunning night cityscape.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension transforms your Firefox New Tab interface into a stunning night cityscape. Featuring a modern city illuminated by vibrant lights, this theme brings a magical and luminous feel to your browsing experience. The toolbar and tabs are optimized to blend seamlessly with the dark background, making content easy to view and visually striking.
